SEARCH
Package Controller

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
Controller.Manager
public class Manager extends Object
The Manager class is responsible for managing competitors and generating reports for a competition. It interacts with the CompetitorList, Competitor, and other related classes.

      Returns:

    • addCompetitor

      public boolean addCompetitor(Competitor competitor)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • removeCompetitor

      public boolean removeCompetitor(int competitorNumber)
      Removes a competitor from the competitor list by their competitor number.
      Parameters:
      competitorNumber - The competitor number of the competitor to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the competitor was successfully removed, false otherwise.

      Retrieves a competitor by their competitor ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:

      public boolean isCompetitionCompleted(String category, Level level)
      Checks if the competition is completed for a specific category and level.
      Parameters:
      category - The category for which to check completion.
      level - The level within the category for which to check completion.
      Returns:
      True if the competition for the given category and level is completed, false otherwise.
